title: Northern Territory Contact. No. 07
creator_credit: Malcolm Otton, Film Australia and Ian Walker
brief_description: Crocodiles have lived in Australia for about 170 million years. Twenty years ago, they were near to extinction but good management and conservation of existing populations has resulted in raising their numbers again.
